name: Bloody Tears
description:
Description:

Once upon a time,
in a not so distant land,
where nobody heard about game engines,
programmers had a really hard time making games.
The only way to ease their suffering was to cry...

Bloody Tears!

Play as windows command line marker and bounce poor programmers' tears back, so they can finally go for the well-deserved rest.

Instructions:

Bounce crying programmers' tears back to them.

Level is completed when there are no sad people on the screen.

Controls:

Left and right arrow - move

Development Team:

Daniel Lewiński (Dante)

Note:

This game was made during Warsaw Film School Game Jam 2019.

Theme of the event was "Once Upon a Time".
